about_the_game:
Europa Universalis IV: Conquistadors Unit Pack contains a total of 16 new models for Spanish and Portuguese armies fighting in the new world.

With a more rugged appearance, Spanish and Portuguese armies operating in the New World will have their own unique look, enhancing your visual Europa Universalis IV experience.
detailed_description:
Europa Universalis IV: Conquistadors Unit Pack contains a total of 16 new models for Spanish and Portuguese armies fighting in the new world.

With a more rugged appearance, Spanish and Portuguese armies operating in the New World will have their own unique look, enhancing your visual Europa Universalis IV experience.
legal_notice: Paradox Interactive, EUROPA UNIVERSALIS® Copyright© [2013] Paradox Interactive AB All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • İşletim Sistemi: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • İşlemci: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Bellek: 2 GB RAM
  • Ekran Kartı: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600 or higher, 1024MB graphics memory required
  • Ağ: Genişbant İnternet bağlantısı
  • Depolama: 2 GB kullanılabilir alan
  • İlave Notlar: GLSL 1.3, OpenGL 2.1. Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer

  • Depolama: 2 GB kullanılabilir alan
  • İlave Notlar: GLSL 1.3, OpenGL 2.1. Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer
